settings.title: 1. The Patch
settings.text: The transdermal patch acts as a carrier for the ingredients, holding them until it's applied.

settings.title: 2. The Application
settings.text: Once applied, the patch's adhesive secures it to the skin, and the patch should stay secure for as long you want to feel the benefits.

settings.title: 3. The Ingredient Delivery
settings.text: The ingredients continuously permeate through the skin and into the bloodstream where they begin acting fast since they aren't being digested.

settings.title: 4. The Removal
settings.text: Each patch lasts up to eight hours, or until you're ready for the effects to wear off if that's sooner.

settings.title: Patches with a purpose
settings.info: Klova patches are meticulously crafted with purpose. Each patch is formulated with clinically proven ingredients shown to help support a specific routine. Whether you struggle with sleep, focus or relaxation - there’s a Klova patch for you.

settings.title: Peel
settings.text: Peel one patch off of the included sheets (28 patches per pack).

settings.title: Stick
settings.text: Stick the patch on any hair-free part of the body with good blood flow.

settings.title: Optimize
settings.text: Before applying the patch, shave the area you'll be apply it to Lorem
settings.popup_info: Before applying the patch, shave the area you'll be apply it to, as even tiny hairs can prevent absorption. For best results, ensure proper blood flow to the area after applying. We recommend applying to the top of the foot and walking for 10 minutes. Alternatively, apply to the upper arm/ shoulder and do a few sets of arm circles or pushups to get blood flowing to the area. Remember, the ingredients absorbing through the upper dermis capillaries NEED a good amount of blood flow to carry them through the body, so do not place the patches on area without good blood flow.

settings.title: Remove
settings.text: Simply remove about 7-9 hours later (ie: remove the sleep patch when you wake up).

settings.title: Peel Stick Optimize
settings.info: Optimize your nights with our best-selling Extra Strength Sleep Patches, and optimize your days with NEW Nootropic Focus Patches. Here's how they work:

settings.title: Denise D.
settings.text:
I've had trouble sleeping for years. I've tried both prescribed and over the counter medication, with no help. I started using the patch 38 nights ago April 27th. I haven't had a bad night's sleep since I put that first patch on.

Give it a try, you might be surprised.

Finally sleep!

We fall asleep faster and stay asleep all night long. Easy to wake up in the morning. We will be getting more!

settings.title: Bill F.
settings.text: I have used your patches religiously for over 2 years and I love them, I also tried the Gummies, my favorite still remains the patches.

settings.title: Susan B.
settings.text:
Worth every penny!

After using this I have seen an increase in the quality of my sleep. I am able to fall asleep and stay that way all night. Many nights I wake up and then can't go back to sleep in the middle of the night due to insomnia.
